body.name: Scrub Daddy Scrub Mommy - Dish Scrubber + Non-Scratch Cleaning Sponges Kitchen, Bathroom + Multi-Surface Safe - Dual-Sided Dish Sponges for Scrubbing + Wiping Spills (3 Count) - Online Exclusive
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 51 mins
features: Dual-Sided + Temperature-Controlled - Scrub Mommy takes traditional kitchen sponges and scrubbers to the next level with her dual sided design. On one side, her FlexTexture foam changes based on your water temperature. Soft in warm water and firm in cool. On the other, spongy ResoFoam helps her create a soapy lather for wiping up spills.

Scratch-Free - Scrub Mommy non scratch sponges are safe to use on over a dozen different surfaces (i.e. glass, stainless steel, cast iron, non-stick coatings, copper, chrome, leather) so you can use her to wash anything from dinner dishes to the car!

Odor Resistant - Unlike other dishwashing sponges, Scrub Mommy is dishwasher safe and built to resist buildup. Plus, when properly maintained, Scrub Mommy can resist odors and stains for up to 8 weeks!

Flexible and Multipurpose - You can use Scrub Mommy kitchen sponges for washing dishes and efficiently cleaning utensils, dishes, furniture, siding, sneakers, bathtubs and more! Anywhere there is dirt, grime, or gunk, these versatile scrubber sponges can help.

Ergonomic and Functional - Scrub Mommy is designed to fit comfortably in your hand and provide good grip and coverage so you can spend less time scrubbing and more time smiling. Her eyes hold onto you for a 360 degree reach, while her mouth cleans both sides of your utensils. No kitchen is complete without this cute and functional dish scrubber sponge.
body.description: When it comes time to fill a brand new kitchen with all your favorite cleaning supplies, cleaning essentials and other home cleaning supplies, make sure to put Scrub Mommy on your list. Unlike other cleaning products for home use, the Scrub Mommy dish sponge can be used all over your home, and is a versatile cleaning sponge that you can couple with your usual kitchen products, but will likely find yourself using for every task from the living room to the garage. So whether you're looking for dish washing sponges kitchen cleaners will love, or the scrub sponges kitchen, living room, bathroom, and car + garage tasks demand; you'll be well served with Scrub Mommy. With proper maintenance, Scrub Mommy can resist odors and stains for up to 8 weeks, but there's no reason why you shouldn't stock up for the long run with a three, six or eight count pack. She's well suited for every task, and can keep your home cleaning routine well equipped and ready for anything. So don't wait another moment, stock up today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A happy little sponge
reviews.reviewText: The cleaning influencers are right, these sponges are fantastic. Not only are they cute, but they are so effective. If you use cold water, the abrasive side stays stiff which is perfect for washing things that are really stuck onto pots/pans. However, they are not so rough that I am worried about scraping the finish on whatever I am cleaning. It's the perfect Goldilocks in-between. If you use hot water, the sponge becomes more malleable and you can better get into the nooks and crannies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have in every kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I mean these don’t even compare to traditional sponges, I’ve had this 3 pack before and they last so long and really get out all the dirt and grime. I will never go back to the traditional! A must have in every kitchen such great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are worth it!
reviews.reviewText: These sponges are all they are made out to be!You wouldn't think that a kitchen sponge could be that fantastic, but they are!I am extremely frugal but someone had bought these for me previously.They were so good that I decided to splurge and buy some more for the following reasons:1. Yes, they cost a lot, but they last forever! I used my first sponges for over a year.2. They are so absorbent! They really keep soap in well and have a fantastic scrubbing ability.3. They remove grease and the rough side removes food really well.I was initially frustrated because they are very stiff at the beginning. However, they soften up in warm water and with use become less stiff in general.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for washing dishes
reviews.reviewText: If you have dishes to wash, you probably need a sponge. This one works adequately. It’s cute, it’s fun, but it’s a little expensive for a sponge. I got two purple ones in my three pack. Purple is a fine color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I made the switch to these a while ago and I won't be using any other sponges. These are a bit pricier than the average sponge, but they don't stink after a week of using them. They feel very sturdy and I've used them for absolutely everything. Love that they're stiff in cold water and soft in warm water. Really good quality sponges!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An honest review
reviews.reviewText: I love scrub daddy, so I decided to try scrub mommy and I love it. They work awesome in any surface and they really help you with cleaning. I recommended 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like those sponges. Love the feel of them. The only reason I don’t put a 5 star is because I need to replace them very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for multiple sponges
reviews.reviewText: Super cute variety. Love the scrub mommy collection with the soft and hard sided options. They last so long too.

Exactly what I needed. Great value for the price paid.The box did arrive damaged, but the sponges themselves weren't affected so I'm still giving five stars. I doubt anyone cares about the packaging, but just in case, putting that there.
Scrub daddy anything is absolutely amazing. High quality, durable, easy to use, and you don't feel like you're covered in scum or bacteria after using. Perfect product!!

Não sei dizer se usei corretamente, mas acredito que sim, afinal é uma esponja…Mas a durabilidade deixou e muito a desejar.Não gaste seu dinheiro com esse produto.Na minha opinião não vale tudo isso.Fora que demora a chegar
Best product for cleaning your dishes. Doesn’t scratch your pots/pans and is very clean unlike other sponges/scrubbers. Last very long as well
